contentList.content: After making a weapon or unarmed attack, you can cast a spell as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
When you cast a damaging spell, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>" to the damage it deals.
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
You seek mastery over mind and body. Your Ki connects you to the Weave.
You only take half damage from falling.
You are immune to being <LSTag Tooltip="CharmedGroup">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.

Arcane energy infuses your strikes. Your melee unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

Whenever you deal damage with a melee unarmed attack, you gain Arcane Acuity for 2 turns.

Gain an additional bonus action.

While in combat, you heal [1] every turn, and restore [2] Ki Point(s).
